title: Harness and baseline validation
checks: docker compose services up and healthy
health and readiness endpoints return HTTP 200
bootstrap seed identities are present and stable
auth contract and schema hardening smoke tests pass

validation.seed_fingerprint: docker compose exec backend python seed-check snippet
validation.smoke_tests: docker compose exec backend sh -lc 'cd /app && pytest -q tests/test_auth_contract_live.py tests/test_schema_m2_live.py'
